languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}криво улыбается{/d}.{/n} "Эмелина была... кем-то вроде наставницы для меня. Она помогла мне, когда я только занял свое место подле Лорд-инквизитора. Обучила психотехникам для концентрации и успокоения. Посвятила в нюансы работы с архивами и инфокриптами. Дала мне возможность отдыхать за делом, разыгрывая с ней партии в регицид".

{n}Heinrix gives you a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}crooked smile{/d}.{/n} "Emelina was something of a mentor to me. She helped me when I had only just joined the Lord Inquisitor's circle. She taught me psy-techniques to maintain my focus and equanimity. She trained me in the finer details of working with archives and data-crypts. She gave me the chance to unwind a little in my post by playing games of regicide with her."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}криво улыбается{/d}.{/n} "Эмелина была... кем-то вроде наставницы для меня. Она помогла мне, когда я только занял свое место подле Лорд-инквизитора. Обучила психотехникам для концентрации и успокоения. Посвятила в нюансы работы с архивами и инфокриптами. Дала мне возможность отдыхать за делом, разыгрывая с ней партии в регицид".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a crooked smile.{/n} "Emelina was something of a mentor to me. She helped me when I had only just joined the Lord Inquisitor's circle. She taught me psy-techniques to maintain my focus and equanimity. She trained me in the finer details of working with archives and data-crypts. She gave me the chance to unwind a little in my post by playing games of regicide with her."

She gave me the chance to unwind a little in my post by playing games of regicide with her."

She taught me psy-techniques to maintain my focus and equanimity. She trained me in the finer details of working with archives and data-crypts. She gave me the chance to unwind a little in my post by playing games of regicide with her."

languages.text: {n}海因里希对你露出了{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}狡猾的笑容{/d}。{/n}“对我而言，艾米莉娜差不多算是我的导师。当我刚刚为大审判官服务时，是她教导了我。她教会了我很多掌握灵能的技巧，帮助我保持专注、冷静。她训练我如何处理档案与数据密存器，也曾与我一起下过弑君棋，让我有机会稍微放松放松。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}crooked smile{/d}.{/n} "Emelina was something of a mentor to me. She helped me when I had only just joined the Lord Inquisitor's circle. She taught me psy-techniques to maintain my focus and equanimity. She trained me in the finer details of working with archives and data-crypts. She gave me the chance to unwind a little in my post by playing games of regicide with her."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希对你露出了狡猾的笑容。{/n}“对我而言，艾米莉娜差不多算是我的导师。当我刚刚为审判长服务时，是她教导了我。她教会了我很多掌握灵能的技巧，帮助我保持专注、冷静。她训练我如何处理档案与数据密存器，也曾与我一起下过弑君棋，让我有机会稍微放松放松。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix esboza una {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}sonrisa torcida{/d}.{/n} «Emelina fue algo así como mi mentora. Me ayudó cuando acababa de unirme al círculo del Lord Inquisidor. Me enseñó técnicas psíquicas para mantener la concentración y la ecuanimidad. Me entrenó en los detalles más específicos del trabajo con archivos y criptas de datos. Me brindó la oportunidad de relajarme un poco en mi puesto con unas partidas de regicidio».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}crooked smile{/d}.{/n} "Emelina was something of a mentor to me. She helped me when I had only just joined the Lord Inquisitor's circle. She taught me psy-techniques to maintain my focus and equanimity. She trained me in the finer details of working with archives and data-crypts. She gave me the chance to unwind a little in my post by playing games of regicide with her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix esboza una sonrisa torcida.{/n} «Emelina fue algo así como mi mentora. Me ayudó cuando acababa de unirme al círculo del Lord Inquisidor. Me enseñó técnicas psíquicas para mantener la concentración y la ecuanimidad. Me entrenó en los detalles más específicos del trabajo con archivos y criptas de datos. Me brindó la oportunidad de relajarme un poco en mi puesto con unas partidas de regicidio».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}歪んだ笑み{/d}を浮かべる。{/n}「エメリナさんは我にとってメンターのような存在でした。我がロード・インクィジターの新参者だったときに手助けをしたり、集中力と平静さを保つための心理テクニックを教えてくれたのです。我にアーカイブとデータ・クリプトの扱い方の詳細を教えてくれたのも、一緒にレジサイドをプレイして、職務中にリラックスする機会を与えてくれたのも彼女でした。」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}crooked smile{/d}.{/n} "Emelina was something of a mentor to me. She helped me when I had only just joined the Lord Inquisitor's circle. She taught me psy-techniques to maintain my focus and equanimity. She trained me in the finer details of working with archives and data-crypts. She gave me the chance to unwind a little in my post by playing games of regicide with her."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}歪んだ笑み{/d}を浮かべる。{/n}「エメリナさんは我にとってメンターのような存在でした。我がロード・インクィジターの新参者だったときに手助けをしたり、集中力と平静さを保つための心理テクニックを教えてくれたのです。我にアーカイブとデータ・クリプトの扱い方の詳細を教えてくれたのも、一緒にレジサイドをプレイして、職務中にリラックスする機会を与えてくれたのも彼女でした。」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous adresse un {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}sourire en coin{/d}.{/n} « Emelina a été une sorte de mentor pour moi. Elle m'a aidé alors que je venais tout juste de rejoindre le cercle du seigneur inquisiteur. Elle m'a enseigné des psy-techniques pour maintenir ma concentration et mon sang-froid. Elle m'a appris à étudier les archives et les cryptes de données plus efficacement. Elle m'a permis de relâcher un peu la pression en faisant quelques parties de régicide avec moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}crooked smile{/d}.{/n} "Emelina was something of a mentor to me. She helped me when I had only just joined the Lord Inquisitor's circle. She taught me psy-techniques to maintain my focus and equanimity. She trained me in the finer details of working with archives and data-crypts. She gave me the chance to unwind a little in my post by playing games of regicide with her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous adresse un sourire en coin.{/n} « Emelina a été une sorte de mentor pour moi. Elle m'a aidé alors que je venais tout juste de rejoindre le cercle du seigneur inquisiteur. Elle m'a enseigné des psy-techniques pour maintenir ma concentration et mon sang-froid. Elle m'a appris à étudier les archives et les cryptes de données plus efficacement. Elle m'a permis de relâcher un peu la pression en faisant quelques parties de régicide avec moi. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}lächelt schief{/d}.{/n} "Emelina war so etwas wie meine Mentorin. Sie half mir, als ich dem Zirkel des Großinquisitors frisch beigetreten war. Sie brachte mir Psi-Techniken bei, um konzentriert und gelassen zu bleiben. Sie unterwies mich in den Details der Arbeit mit Archiven und Daten-Krypten. Sie gab mir die Chance zur Entspannung auf meinem Posten, indem sie Königsmord mit mir spielte."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}crooked smile{/d}.{/n} "Emelina was something of a mentor to me. She helped me when I had only just joined the Lord Inquisitor's circle. She taught me psy-techniques to maintain my focus and equanimity. She trained me in the finer details of working with archives and data-crypts. She gave me the chance to unwind a little in my post by playing games of regicide with her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lächelt schief.{/n} "Emelina war so etwas wie meine Mentorin. Sie half mir, als ich dem Zirkel des Großinquisitors frisch beigetreten war. Sie brachte mir Psi-Techniken bei, um konzentriert und gelassen zu bleiben. Sie unterwies mich in den Details der Arbeit mit Archiven und Daten-Krypten. Sie gab mir die Chance zur Entspannung auf meinem Posten, indem sie Königsmord mit mir spielte."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}çarpık bir şekilde gülümsüyor{/d}.{/n} "Emelina benim için bir yönder gibiydi. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun çevresine yeni katılmışken bana yardımcı oldu. Odağımı ve soğukkanlılığımı koruyabilmemi sağlayan ruhsezi teknikleri öğretti. Arşivler ve veri mahzenleri üzerinde çalışmanın inceliklerini gösterdi. Benimle kral katili oynayarak görevimin getirdiği stresin üstesinden gelme olanağı tanıdı."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}crooked smile{/d}.{/n} "Emelina was something of a mentor to me. She helped me when I had only just joined the Lord Inquisitor's circle. She taught me psy-techniques to maintain my focus and equanimity. She trained me in the finer details of working with archives and data-crypts. She gave me the chance to unwind a little in my post by playing games of regicide with her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}çarpık bir şekilde gülümsüyor{/d}.{/n} "Emelina benim için bir yönder gibiydi. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun çevresine yeni katılmışken bana yardımcı oldu. Odağımı ve soğukkanlılığımı koruyabilmemi sağlayan ruhsezi teknikleri öğretti. Arşivler ve veri mahzenleri üzerinde çalışmak hakkındaki ince detaylarda beni eğitti. Benimle kral katili oynayarak bana, görevimin getirdiği stresin üstesinden gelme olanağı tanıdı."
